pages.text: Sieving Dirt and using the String Mesh will output:$(br)-Stone Pebble: 0.9$(br)-Andesite Pebble: 0.05$(br)-Basalt Pebble: 0.05$(br)-Blackstone Pebble: 0.05$(br)-Diorite Pebble: 0.05$(br)-Granite Pebble: 0.05$(br)-Wheat Seeds: 0.2$(br)-Ancient Spores: 0.05$(br)-Carrot Seeds: 0.05$(br)-Melon Seeds: 0.05$(br)-Potato Seeds: 0.05$(br)-Pumkin Seeds: 0.05

$(br)$(br)$(br)-Sweet Berry Seeds: 0.04$(br)-Cactus Seeds: 0.04$(br)-Cocoa Beans: 0.04$(br)-Sugarcane Seeds: 0.04$(br)-Acacia Seed: 0.03$(br)-Bamboo Seed: 0.03$(br)-Beetroot Seeds: 0.03$(br)-Brich Seed: 0.03$(br)-Dark Oak Seed: 0.03$(br)-Grass Seeds: 0.03$(br)-Jungle Seed: 0.03$(br)-Oak Seed: 0.03$(br)-Spruce Seed: 0.03$(br)-Vines: 0.03
